fields.name: keyFile
fields.description: A file containing the private key in PKCS8 format

fields.name: keyPassword
fields.description: Password of the private key if it is encrypted

records.name: CertKey
records.description: Represents combination of certificate, private key and private key password if encrypted.

fields.name: timeout
fields.description:
The socket reading timeout value to be used 
in seconds. If this is not set,the default value
of 300 seconds (5 minutes) will be used.

records.name: ClientConfiguration
records.description: Configurations for the connection oriented tcp client.

fields.name: cert
fields.description: Configurations associated with `crypto:TrustStore` or single certificate file that the client trusts

fields.name: ciphers
fields.description:
List of ciphers to be used
eg: TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256, TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_CBC_SHA

records.name: ClientSecureSocket
records.description: Secure Socket configuration for TCP Client.

fields.name: key
fields.description: Configurations associated with `crypto:KeyStore` or combination of certificate and (PKCS8) private key of the server

fields.name: ciphers
fields.description:
List of ciphers to be used
eg: TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256, TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_CBC_SHA

records.name: ListenerSecureSocket
records.description: Secure Socket configuration for TCP Listener.

objectTypes.name: ConnectionService

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: The data need to be sent to the remote host

returnParameters.description: () or else a `tcp:Error` if the given data can't be sent

remoteMethods.name: writeBytes
remoteMethods.description: Sends the response as byte[] to the same remote host.

returnParameters.description:
() or else a `tcp:Error` if the connection can't be properly
closed

fields.description: The hostname or the IP address of the remote host

fields.name: remotePort
fields.description: The port number of the remote host

fields.name: localPort
fields.description: The port number which the socket is binded

clients.name: Caller
clients.description: Represents caller object in tcp service remote methods

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: The data need to be sent to the connected remote host

returnParameters.description: () or else a `tcp:Error` if the given data can't be sent

remoteMethods.name: writeBytes
remoteMethods.description:
Sends the given data to the connected remote host.
```ballerina
tcp:Error? result = socketClient->writeBytes("msg".toBytes());
```

returnParameters.description:
The `readonly & byte[]`, or else a `tcp:Error` if the data
can't be read from the remote host

remoteMethods.name: readBytes
remoteMethods.description:
Reads data only from the connected remote host. 
```ballerina
(readonly & byte[])|tcp:Error result = socketClient->readBytes();
```

returnParameters.description: A `tcp:Error` if it can't close the connection or else `()`

remoteMethods.name: close
remoteMethods.description:
Free up the occupied socket.
```ballerina
tcp:Error? closeResult = socketClient->close();
```

parameters.name: remoteHost
parameters.description: The hostname or the IP address of the remote host

parameters.name: remotePort
parameters.description: The port number of the remmote host

parameters.name: config
parameters.description: Connection oriented client related configuration

methods.name: init
methods.description:
Initializes the TCP client based on the 
provided configurations.
```ballerina
tcp:Client|tcp:Error? socketClient = new("www.remote.com", 80,
                             localHost = "localHost");
```

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: The data need to be sent to the connected remote host

returnParameters.description: () or else a `tcp:Error` if the given data can't be sent

methods.name: writeBytes
methods.description:
Sends the given data to the connected remote host.
```ballerina
tcp:Error? result = socketClient->writeBytes("msg".toBytes());
```

returnParameters.description:
The `readonly & byte[]`, or else a `tcp:Error` if the data
can't be read from the remote host

methods.name: readBytes
methods.description:
Reads data only from the connected remote host. 
```ballerina
(readonly & byte[])|tcp:Error result = socketClient->readBytes();
```

returnParameters.description: A `tcp:Error` if it can't close the connection or else `()`

methods.name: close
methods.description:
Free up the occupied socket.
```ballerina

```

parameters.name: s
parameters.description: Type descriptor of the service

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the service

returnParameters.description:
`()` or else a `tcp:Error` upon failure to register
the listener

lifeCycleMethods.name: attach
lifeCycleMethods.description:
Binds a service to the `tcp:Listener`.
```ballerina
tcp:error? result = tcpListener.attach(helloService);
```

parameters.name: localPort
parameters.description: The port number of the remote service

parameters.name: config
parameters.description: Configurations related to the `tcp:Listener`

methods.name: init
methods.description:
Initializes the TCP listener based on the privovided configurations. 
```ballerina
 listener Listener|error? server1 = new (8080);
```

parameters.name: s
parameters.description: Type descriptor of the service

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the service

returnParameters.description:
`()` or else a `tcp:Error` upon failure to register
the listener

methods.name: attach
methods.description:
Binds a service to the `tcp:Listener`.
```ballerina
tcp:error? result = tcpListener.attach(helloService);
```

returnParameters.description:
An `error` if an error occurred during the listener 
starting process

An `error` if an error occurred during the listener
stopping process

methods.name: gracefulStop
methods.description:
Stops the service listener gracefully. Already-accepted requests will be
served before connection closure.

returnParameters.description:
An `error` if an error occurred during the listener
stop process

methods.name: immediateStop
methods.description: Stops the service listener immediately. It is not implemented yet.

parameters.name: s
parameters.description: Type descriptor of the service

returnParameters.description: `()` or else a `tcp:Error` upon failure to detach the service

methods.name: detach
methods.description:
Stops consuming messages and detaches the service from the `tcp:Listener`.
```ballerina
tcp:error? result = tcpListener.detach(helloService);
```

parameters.name: localPort
parameters.description: The port number of the remote service

parameters.name: config
parameters.description: Configurations related to the `tcp:Listener`

initMethod.description:
Initializes the TCP listener based on the privovided configurations. 
```ballerina
 listener Listener|error? server1 = new (8080);
```

starting process

An `error` if an error occurred during the listener
stopping process

Stops the service listener gracefully. Already-accepted requests will be
served before connection closure.

otherMethods.name: detach
otherMethods.description:
Stops consuming messages and detaches the service from the `tcp:Listener`.
```ballerina
tcp:error? result = tcpListener.detach(helloService);
```

listeners.name: Listener
listeners.description:
This is used for creating TCP server endpoints. A TCP server endpoint is
capable of responding to remote callers. The `Listener` is responsible for
initializing the endpoint using the provided configurations.

packages.name: tcp
packages.summary: This package provides an implementation for sending/receiving messages to/from another application process (local or remote) for both connection-oriented protocols.
